confirm_clear_all: Are you sure you want to delete ALL accounts?
send_zip: Send a ZIP archive with accounts or .maFile file
invalid_format:
Invalid data format. Use format:
login:password:email:email_password
unsupported_file: Unsupported file type. Only .maFile and .zip are supported.
send_asf_template: Send ASF config template in JSON format as a text message or .json file. Login and password will be automatically replaced for each account.
invalid_template_format: Invalid template format. Send JSON in a text message or as a .json file.
invalid_json: Invalid JSON format. Check the template structure.
help_text:
*Available commands:*

📋 *Account list* - view all saved accounts
🔄 *Refresh* - refresh account list
📤 *Import ZIP* - import accounts from ZIP archive
📥 *Download all accounts* - download all accounts as ZIP archive
🗑 *Clear storage* - delete all accounts
⚙️ *ASF Configs* - generate configs for ArchiSteamFarm
🌐 *Language / Язык* - change language
❓ *Help* - show this message

*How to add an account:*
1. Send a text message in format:
   `login:password:email:email_password`

2. Send .maFile file to add Steam Guard data

3. Send ZIP archive containing accounts.txt and/or .maFile files
account_format:
Account login: 
{login}
Account password: 
{password}
Account email: 
{mail}
Email password: 
{mail_password}

{r_code}
STEAMID: 
{steam_id}
Link: {link}
